full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BLA MA YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I TSIGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BLA MA YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS LDAN PA RDZONG DKAR RDONG BZHUGS RGYAL BRTZEGS CHOS MDZAD KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GO ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
